label: General Manager of the civil private investigation office, Yehuda Tenenboim leaving the Police investigation department after giving his version on the investigation his office made after Moshe Ozer, a Likud member of Bat Yam, who encovered that a Labour Party member tried to bribe him to abandon his faction.
